function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and accumulation of airborne pathogens.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne diseases and negative impact on occupants' health.","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation system design, distribution, and maintenance.","Technologies":"Air purification systems, vertical unidirectional airflow, improved ventilation processes.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, surgical team, general population.","Owner":"Building engineers, architects, air quality specialists."},{"Description":"Insufficient air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution.","Impact":"Exposure to indoor air pollutants, energy consumption, and operating expenses.","Mitigation":"Utilizing effective air filtration technology, regular maintenance of filtration systems.","Technologies":"Air filtration technology, liquid air purification systems.","People":"Occupants of the built environment, general population.","Owner":"Air quality specialists, building engineers, maintenance personnel."}]}
